title: Serwyn of the Mirror Shield (2020, video available)
description:
Serwyn of the Mirror Shield is one of the most frequently cited heroic  legends... he slew a dragon! His deeds and character bring to mind many  parallels to famous current and recent figures like Barristan the Bold,  Ser Criston Cole, Erryk & Arryk and several members of House Swann. Published May 24th, 2020. This episode should have a video available on Spotify.
